input:
Job Title: QA Tester
Job Description: Focus: Identifying bugs and defects through manual and automated testing. Responsibilities: Executing test cases and test scripts. Documenting defects and reporting them to developers. Verifying bug fixes. Ensuring software meets quality standards and user expectations. Skills: Attention to detail, analytical skills, communication skills, and knowledge of testing methodologies. Tools: Test management tools (e.g., Jira), bug tracking systems.

output.Job Summary: Responsible for identifying software bugs using manual and automated testing techniques and ensuring quality standards.
